sn22.24:1.2: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding form, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn22.24:1.3: Without directly knowing and completely understanding feeling …
sn22.24:1.6: consciousness, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn22.24:1.7: By directly knowing and completely understanding form, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.
sn22.24:1.8: By directly knowing and completely understanding feeling …
sn22.24:1.11: consciousness, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
